name: GRO Scalp Massager
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Scalp Treatments
about: What it is:A silicone scalp massager with a comfortable-grip handle that invigorates the scalp to promote circulation and support healthy-looking hair..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Thinning.Key Benefits:- Supports relaxation and a healthy scalp.What Else You Need to Know:The GRO Revitalizing Scalp Massager pairs perfectly with any of Vegamour's scalp products or can be used on its own for a relaxing scalp massage.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply your favorite scalp product of choice: shampoo, conditioner, scrub, GRO Hair Serum, GRO Scalp Detoxifying Serum, or treatments (all sold separately)..-Holding the massager in the palm of your hand, gently press the tips to the scalp and massage..-Repeat all over the scalp for as long as youu2019d like..-Can be used on wet or dry hair, with or without product..-Suitable for use in or out of the shower..-Rinse the massager in cool water and hang to dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this scalp massager! It's big enough to cover a good area, and it's incredibly comfortable to use. A great feature is that you can open it up completely to let it dry, so no mold will grow inside. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_title: A must-have for hair wash days
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This massager is so soft and evenly distributes the shampoo. Loved it!!
